prompt: An underwater scene showing a powerful Triton, a humanoid sea creature with a trident, standing protectively amidst vibrant coral formations. The triton has a regal, yet sturdy appearance, adorned with seaweed and shells, exuding an air of authority. His skin glistens in the shimmering light filtering through the water, and small schools of fish swim around him in a respectful manner. The background features a lush, colorful reef, teeming with exotic marine life, creating a harmonious and enchanting underwater world.
